Package org.tigris.gef.ui

Interface Summary
Highlightable  
IStatusBar Interface that must be implemented by any window that wants to take responsibility for displaying status bar information (e.g., "Loading File...".
PopupGenerator  
 

Class Summary
ColorRenderer  
JSortedTable  
PaletteFig A Palette that defines buttons to create lines, rectangles, rounded rectangles, circles, and text.
Progress A general purpose progress bar dialog box that shows percentage completion of some long running operation, and allows the user to cancel.
